summary: Hate constantly failing at Intimidation challenges. i have the mod for you
descriptionHtml:
slightly modifies the perk that doubles intimidation chances and multiplies it to a point where you should succeed at all intimidation challenges. not tested on every challenge, but hasnt failed me yet. currently on my 6th or 7th playthrough...

not sure if its compatible with other mods that change the intimidation skill perk in the speech tree may need to load this mod after any that change it to get this one to work
author: blackrose
